assessmentQuestionVersion.helpText: Citizenship status refers to the child's legal status in the country. In this case, the options are that they may be a U.S. Citizen, or a qualified immigrant (green card holder). Any other status, such as a temporary visa holder or undocumented is "Other"
assessmentQuestionVersion.name: ChildrenCitizenshipStatus
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: What is the citizenship status of your children?
